items.content_html: The To-Do List application is a simple web-based tool built with Flask for managing tasks. Users can add, view, and delete tasks through a clean and responsive interface. It uses an in-memory list for storage, making it a lightweight and efficient task manager.
items.title: ShumailaSarfaraz/shumaila_sarfaraz_todo_list_project: The To-Do List application is a simple web-based tool built with Flask for managing tasks. Users can add, view, and delete tasks through a clean and responsive interface. It uses an in-memory list for storage, making it a lightweight and efficient task manager.

items.content_html: a simple, lightweight class-based package for making RESTful API requests in JavaScript projects. It provides an easy-to-use interface for sending HTTP requests to an API using JSON. Aimed to have minimum config setup (virtually no required params) and yet powerful.
items.title: vasili83/api-handler: a simple, lightweight class-based package for making RESTful API requests in JavaScript projects. It provides an easy-to-use interface for sending HTTP requests to an API using JSON. Aimed to have minimum config setup (virtually no required params) and yet powerful.
